text:
Hello team!
Here are the merge requests to review today:
*schematron*
Suzanne Hamilton: <https://dri-dev-scm1.web.local/dri-software/schematron/merge_requests/13|Update dri-parent>
*xslt-extensions*
Ian Hoyle: <https://dri-dev-scm1.web.local/dri-software/xslt-extensions/merge_requests/12|Find all extension functions by reflection>
Suzanne Hamilton: <https://dri-dev-scm1.web.local/dri-software/xslt-extensions/merge_requests/11|Add 'delete-file' and 'is-directory' extension functions>
Laura Damian: <https://dri-dev-scm1.web.local/dri-software/xslt-extensions/merge_requests/10|Add initializer class to register extension functions>
